Latest_Blogs.blog_title: API, REST API and RESTful API
Latest_Blogs.description: REST API and RESTful API used in the modern state of client/server architecture in software development. In this article you will be introducing to APIs, Rest API and Restful APIs.

Although everyone won’t agree on one way to structure and organize a React project, I’m sure most will agree that proper and logical structuring in the codebase of a project — especially when working with a team on large projects— makes development much more productive.
The live quarantine tech talk, 'A chat with Angelica'.
